refnamediv.refpurpose: Approximate count of number of distinct values

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para:
approximate count
aggregates
approximate count The approxdc aggregate takes a set of values from an array attribute and returns an approximate count of the number of distinct values present.
The approxdc aggregate does not count null values.

informalexample.para: These examples find the approximate number of distinct words in an array or in various subsets of the array.

step.para: Show the array schema:select * from show(wordOfConversation);This query returns:wordOfConversation <wordID:int64> [languageID=1:1000,100,0, conversationID=1:5000000,1000,0, timeOffsetInSeconds=1:10000,1000,100]

For each language represented in the array, show the approximate count of distinct words used in all conversations in that language:SELECT approxdc(wordID) FROM wordOfConversation GROUP BY languageID;
For each conversation represented in the array, show the approximate count of distinct words used:SELECT approxdc(wordID) FROM wordOfConversation GROUP BY conversationID;
